Return the maximal absolute difference for all transcripts of the provided gene

Source: R/utility_functions.R
getmax.Rd

Return the maximal absolute difference for all transcripts of the provided gene

getmax(gID, dturtle)

Arguments

gID

gene-identifier
dturtle

dturtle object

Value

The maximal absolute difference value
